amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Corps of Engineers, Investigations by $1 million and reduces funding for Departmental Administration by a similar amount in order to address a backlog in Army Corps of Engineers projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for Corps of Engineers, Investigations by $1,000,000 and reduce funding for Departmental Administration by $1,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Gosar.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
